cab.content:
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 13th SEPTEMBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
There is nothing to report.
French Front.
On the ST. MIHIEL battle front the line is reported to run as follows :- NORROY, VILLERS-SOUS-PRENY, TAULNY, south of DAMPVITOUX, thence south-west to south of ST. BENOIT, HATTONVILLE, HATTONCHATEL, (both inclusive), thence through the BOIS DE HANHONVILLE to HERBEUVILLE (inclusive), COMBRES, (inclusive).
Estimated number of prisoners is 12,000.
2. ITALIAN AND MACEDONIAN FRONTS.
There is nothing to report.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
13th September, 1918.
Issued at 6.20 p.m.
